name: Drop Cat Blaster!
description:
Pawel, the genius

Pawel was a promising engineering student, being acknowledged as a genius.

However, outside of the lab, across the country there was a massive revolt overthrowing the country, a "rally of the stupid people" in Pawel's eyes.

Nothing was wrong until those "stupid"s bashed into his laboratory. They dragged out Pawel, labeling him as an "enemy of the poor".

Pawel was beaten and insulted all that day.

He became to have a profound fear encountering the people, and eventually dropped out of the graduate school. He ran away to his grand mother's place, she was the only person who would always be standing on his side.

-"Carrying on life"-

He was relieved, and he could say he was happy.

It was not unitll the time his grand mother passed away. An prominent engineer of the generation, pioneer of the space exploration who inspired a kiddo Pawel, gone. And nobody cares. 

Granny's last word to Pawel was to keep carrying on life, no matter what happens. Pawel never wanted to disobey his granny, 
but he had a different idea of "carrying on" his life. 

A freezer pod that his granny had built.

The magnificent device designed for interstellar travel that could freeze him away 
to 500 years later at maximum.

Well... better to be frozen than to die!
right?..... RIGHT????

-The New ruler-

Waking up, he finds out that all of the humanity had moved to Mars.

Somehow the biological mutant built for their labor had gone nuts, overrun the human society.

And they...seems to be departing from Mars, but to where?

The cats starts to fall from the sky damaging his granny's house

The Mars is full, those anthropoid cats have decided to come back to the empty, abandoned Earth.

So Pawel gets his new objective,
Punching all the cat mutants falling from the sky. 

Protecting his granny's home sweet home

Team GooCatGame Dev. studio located in South Korea
